about_app_desc: Phum Dictionary, developed by Biz Solution, is an innovative digital resource designed to tackle the challenges faced by students and the general public in translating various languages including Khmer, English, Korean and Chinese. Phum Dictionary not only facilitates effective communication but also contributes to the preservation and promotion of the Khmer language and script.
drop_file: Drop file here or choose a file
dictionary_not_available: The current language's dictionary is not available yet. It will be available soon. Please check back later.
no_text_found: No text detected in the document. Please ensure the document contains readable text and try again.
risk_device_message:
Your device appears to be Jailbroken or Rooted, which may pose security risks and could compromise the safety of your data. To ensure a secure experience, your usage of this app has been restricted.

In order to regain access to PhumDictionary, we recommend restoring your device to its original state by removing any Jailbreak or Root access.
